content: *find a free version of this pattern here 1 * ***get ready for the stash buster of your dreams *** the sedona sweater is the pullover pattern for everyone need to use up some leftover yarn great want to try tunisian crochet in a big way perfect looking for a basic pattern to customize you found it the sedona sweater pattern is a simple recipe for a beginner-friendly drop-sleeve pullover personalize the fit color stitches anything you want have some fun and create the sweater you ve always wanted **pattern highlights** // whether it s your first crocheted sweater or your 50th you ll love the simplicity of the sedona sweater // pattern available in sizes small - 3xl easily adjust the body panels and sleeves to any size you need // pdf version includes the exact colors and amount of row for the stripe pattern used in the original sample **available sizes ** size finished bust in inches approximate yardage small 40 1450 medium 44 1600 large 46 1670 x-large 54 1960 2xl 56 2030 3xl 58 2095 **suggested yarn ** knit picks swish dk or comparable dk weight yarn check your gauge **hooks used ** 4mm and 5mm traditional crochet hooks 6mm tunisian crochet hook with varying cord lengths to 24 **notions used ** -scissors -tapestry needle -tape measure // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/sedona-sweater -free-tunisian-crochet-pullover-pattern-from-leftover-yarn
